Attributes.description: Fluid properties, equations of state. Pressure, buoyancy, hydrostatic forces. Conservation of mass, momentum, and energy. Work and heat; internal energy and enthalpy. Bernoulli's equation. Dimensional analysis, modelling. Turbulent flow in pipes; turbomachinery. Second law and the Carnot cycle; entropy; first and second law analysis of systems.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 8:00, End Time: 9:00, Building: Hugh, Room: Dempster
